ygData.subject: Re: Best place to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a level 22 cleric.  At 8, I would say hmm you could stay in nektulos and try and find mummies or zombies, but you could group in east commons, go to Nro
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a level 22 cleric. At 8, I would say hmm you could stay in nektulos and
try and find mummies or zombies, but you could group in east commons, go to
Nro and take dervishes with a group, or try and make level 9 in befallen
level 1. Once you hit 9 i would say group in wcom til 12 or more, then you
can stay in wcom or go to lavastorm which is also good. Once you hit 14
grab your spells and try and hit befallen level 2 :)
Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
